rows.label: qev090404_MSG0001
rows.name: W-wait! Don't eat me! I taste terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh, please let this all be some kind of bad dream...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0003
rows.name: Huh? Are you... Did you come here to save me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0075
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0076
rows.name: Tell him it's all going to be okay.

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0077
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0078
rows.name: Demand a status report on the double.

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, thank you...
Those things ate everyone else, and I was sure I was next![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0005
rows.name: We came here to eliminate the indigen leading this pack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0006
rows.name: Sure enough, we managed to kill it, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0007
rows.name:
its dying screams filled the rest of the indigens
with some kind of blood rage or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0008
rows.name: They...they ate everyone in my squad. I was sure I was next...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0009
rows.name:
So you ran off in a blind panic?
What happened to centering yourself, Reggie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0010
rows.name:
S-Sensei? What are you doing here?
You were off on a mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0011
rows.name:
You think some patrol job is more important
than coming to my student's rescue?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0012
rows.name:
I secured powerful backup and came running.
Now get a grip, son![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0013
rows.name: R-right! Thank you, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0014
rows.name:
You're in for a hell of a dressing-down later.
For now, let's finish this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0015
rows.name: They weren't far behind me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0016
rows.name:
P-please, just kill them so we
can all go back to New LA alive...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0017
rows.name: Leave it to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0018
rows.name: We'll show these monsters what true warriors can do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0019
rows.name: Why do you still cower over there, son? It's finished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0020
rows.name:
I... Sensei, I'm sorry. I couldn't put any
of what you taught me into practice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0021
rows.name:
You always said never to betray my team,
but I ran. I left them to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's over. I'm leaving BLADE.
I never should have joined in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0023
rows.name:
A coward like me will never be the
sort of warrior you taught us about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0024
rows.name:
Mmm. It is a fine thing to reflect on our
weaknesses from time to time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0025
rows.name: Wouldn't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0030
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that a coward like Reggie endangers everyone.

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0040
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell Reggie that he will regret quitting
for the rest of his days.

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0026
rows.name: Ouch... Harsh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0027
rows.name: But it's true—BLADE has no place for someone like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0028
rows.name: That's...kind of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0029
rows.name: But that sort of kindness usually winds up hurting people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0030
rows.name:
If a guy like me keeps trying,
it will only put more people in danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0031
rows.name: Hmmm, I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0032
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0033
rows.name: KAAAAAAAAAATSU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0034
rows.name: You turned your comrades' deaths into an excuse to flee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0035
rows.name: Grow up and face the truth, son![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0036
rows.name: You're just afraid because some monster nearly ate you alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0037
rows.name: But look past that! Think on the future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0038
rows.name:
Do we whimper and die?
Or do we find the Lifehold and reclaim what we have lost?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0039
rows.name: S-Sensei...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0040
rows.name:
You're better than this. Now stand still
so I can knock some guts into you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0041
rows.name: You can carry this weight, son![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0050
rows.name: Intercede

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0051
rows.name: Prevent Bozé from hitting Reggie.

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0060
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0061
rows.name: Look on as Bozé reprimands Reggie.

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0042
rows.name:
Huh? Sometimes a man needs a good punch.
It's my responsibility to get him past this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0043
rows.name:
Now, answer me!
Are you the sort of man to end it like a dog?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0044
rows.name: Well? Are you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0045
rows.name:
How many years has it been
since I was a student at the academy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0046
rows.name: And yet you came all this way for me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0047
rows.name: I'm undeserving, and yet you treat me like your own family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0048
rows.name: You're an inspiration, Sensei![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0049
rows.name: When you put it like that, you know I can't run away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0050
rows.name:
Ha ha! Damned right you can't.
Now get your butt back to New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0051
rows.name:
Train like you've never trained before,
and show the Harriers what you're made of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0052
rows.name: Yes, sir! Thank you, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0053
rows.name: Sorry to make you see that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0054
rows.name:
Still, he's got a heart like a gong, that one.
Strike it firm, and it rings true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0070
rows.name: Stare

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0071
rows.name: Admit that you do not understand Bozé at all.

rows.label: qev090404_JNK0080
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: qev090404_SEL0081
rows.name: Claim that Bozé's lesson was quite informative.

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0055
rows.name: A shame. Hopefully, my mighty cry will someday stir your soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0056
rows.name:
So you wish to learn, do you?
I have a soft spot for your kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0057
rows.name: Come. Eleonora will be waiting for our report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0058
rows.name:
Stay sharp on the road home.
Danger always comes just when you start to relax.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0059
rows.name:
Well, no sense lingering here now that the job's done.
Let's get moving—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0060
rows.name: Um, hold on, please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0061
rows.name: Who's there?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0062
rows.name: It's...me? The Ma-non you saved. Er, remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0063
rows.name:
Ah, the xeno.
I see your legs are once again in working order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0064
rows.name: All thanks to to you, right? Which is why I brought you...this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0065
rows.name: What is it? Some kind of transmitter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0066
rows.name: A very powerful one, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0067
rows.name:
One click and any spatial distortions
in the area are fixed, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0068
rows.name: Sounds bizarre. I have no need for such trinkets![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0069
rows.name:
All a BLADE needs is a well-honed heart
and a body to house it! We humans—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0070
rows.name:
Um, can you please just take it?
Maybe call it a good luck charm or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0071
rows.name: Right then. I'll just be be going, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0072
rows.name: Hmph. I do not understand those Ma-non at all...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0073
rows.name: Come. Eleonora will be waiting for our report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090404_MSG0074
rows.name:
Stay sharp on the road home.
Danger always comes just when you start to relax.[ST:wait ]
